'West Reading' is a borough in Berks County, Pennsylvania, United States. The
population was 4,212 at the 2010 census. It contains a vibrant main street (Penn
Avenue) and the large Reading Hospital and Medical Center. It is also the site
of the VF Outlet Village, one of the largest outlet malls in the United States.
The VF Outlet Village is located in the buildings of the former Berkshire
Knitting Mills, which was in operation from 1908-
1975. [http://www.vfovillage.com/aboutus.htm
http://www.vfovillage.com/aboutus.htm] vfovillage.com
